page.title: 10TOURISTS IN WEARDALE
page.content: {In summer tourists come up to enjoy {the countryside.}Most tourists and caravaners come from Tyneside and Wearside. In Westgate there are three {caravan sites}and one in St Johns Chapel. Altogether there are about 100 caravans in our area. At the petrol station is a{campsite}for small caravans and tents. Sometimes we get visitors from Holland, France and Germany. The petrol station sells sweets, cigarettes and calor gas for them. The camp site in Westgate opens from March to October. In St Johns Chapel there are some{Bed and {Breakfast houses}and at the Golden Lion there are some{holiday flats. {Many day trippers}come to have a picnic in Slit Wood which is a local beauty spot near Westgate. Tourists make good business for people who work in shops.
